what_you_do: Principal at MaisFour Enterprises and Managing Member at Motorcar Realty Holdings LLC. Previously served as Chief Investment Officer and Vice Chairman at Dreyfus Corporation (BNY Mellon), overseeing alternative investments and long-term fund strategies.
bio: Phillip Nicholas Maisano is a retired Vice Chairman and Chief Investment Officer of Dreyfus Corporation (BNY Mellon), where he led alternative investments and fund management strategies from 2007 to 2011. He currently serves as Principal of MaisFour Enterprises and Managing Member of Motorcar Realty Holdings LLC. He is a member of the Iona University Board of Trustees and holds a 1976 MBA from Iona.
business_focus: Investment management and real estate holdings through MaisFour Enterprises and Motorcar Realty Holdings LLC.
